charaepi_general_talk_06/6301_1201_0100_: Hoho! My, would you look at all these sync pairs!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6301_1201_0200_:
Since we’re here, I’ll give you a lecture on any
Pokémon you like. Are there any sync pairs you’re
particularly interested in?
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1101_0100_:
It looks like someone dropped a Poké Ball in
the bushes!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_0401_0500_:
Did you think that was a Poké Ball?
It’s my Voltorb!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_0402_0800_:
Phew! That was close! Mistaking that for a
Poké Ball and grabbing it could’ve been bad!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_0402_0900_: My Voltorb will shock you if you startle it.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1201_1000_:
Hoho! In this case, being shocked isn’t so bad,
you know.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1201_1100_:
Voltorb are known to use Self-Destruct when
they’re touched. You’ve got to be very careful!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1201_1200_: Could it be... Are you the real Professor Oak?
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0100_: My Vileplume is the greatest in the world!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0200_:
Hmm, it truly does have some impressive petals!
Vileplume are said to have some of the largest
petals in the world.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0300_:
But one must be very wary of their pollen. It’s
best for me to observe it from a distance, I’d say.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0400_:
I’ll have Vileplume show off some of its moves
for you.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0301_0500_: I want to see Poison Powder!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0302_0800_: I want to see Stun Spore!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0402_1000_: Ugh! My body feels so stiff all of a sudden...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1100_: Oh my! Here, take this medicine!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1200_:
Research has its occasional dangers. I’m glad I
brought along that medicine!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1300_:
There are some Pokémon Professors who face
down Pokémon moves themselves, but...this is
inadvisable in my opinion.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1400_:
Once you understand a move, you can plan a
counterattack to it! How about it? Want to see
a move again?
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0301_1500_: I want to see Poison Powder!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0302_1800_: I want to see Stun Spore!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0402_2000_: Ugh! My body feels so stiff all of a sudden...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_2100_:
Hmm... Well, I suppose as long as there’s enough
medicine it’ll be all right.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6304_1201_0100_:
Hoho! Off to encounter a never-before-seen
Pokémon! Let’s go!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6305_1201_0100_: Perhaps that Pokémon could be a Mythical...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0100_: Inside those three Poké Balls are Pokémon!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0200_:
Hm? Oh, well, that’s just something I say when
these three Pokémon are together!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0300_: Ah, over there! Aren’t those our Pokémon? Hey!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0500_:
What were you doing, running off like that? I’m
so glad I found you!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0600_:
Hm? I have never been separated from my
Charmander before...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0800_:
But for a second, I could’ve sworn I saw
another Pokémon...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0900_:
It looks like there’s something strange going on in
this forest, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We should
have a closer look!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1000_:
Huh? You’re right. I could’ve sworn there was one
more Pokémon.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1100_: I was pretty sure there was another Charmander.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1200_:
There’s no way there’s another Charmander as
cute as mine around!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1300_:
Even if there were two, I’d never mistake my
partner Pokémon for any other Charmander!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6307_1201_0100_: Oh? There’s something behind that stone!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6307_1201_0300_:
I thought I saw something in the shadow of that
rock, but it’s already disappeared again!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6307_1201_0400_:
That mysterious Pokémon must be close now!
Let’s chase after it!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6310_1201_0100_:
This feeling... No, no. Don’t go getting ahead of
yourself now, Oak.
charaepi_general_talk_06/6311_1201_0100_:
I’ll check over here and leave that way to
you, OK?
charaepi_general_talk_06/6313_1031_0100_:
Is there really no trace of
a Mythical Pokémon?
charaepi_general_talk_06/6313_1201_0100_:
I just can’t seem to find that Mythical Pokémon that
Blaine spoke of...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6313_1201_0200_: It’s too early to give up yet! Let’s keep searching!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6314_1201_0100_: Strange. It should’ve gone in this direction...
charaepi_general_talk_06/6314_1201_0200_: Hey, Gramps! Quit running around so much!
charaepi_general_talk_06/6314_1201_0300_:
It’s getting tiring for us to keep chasing after you.
Give us a break for a bit... Huh?
